text: was a Japanese samurai of the late Edo period. He is known for his role in the Boshin War. ==Early life== Hosoya was born into a family of samurai who served the Date clan of Sendai han.Iwamoto, Hiromitsu. (1999). Nanshin: Japanese settlers in Papua and New Guinea 1890-1949, p. 81. ==References== Category:1840 births Category:1907 deaths Category:People from Sendai
title: Hosoya Jūdayū
